story_26_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Velkommen to my lab! I wonder if my special
assistants are ready.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: Thanks for helping me out before.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Hi there, Hau. I hear you’re doing pretty good in
the PML.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
And this must be [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’ve heard a lot about you.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
My name’s Molayne. I run the Hokulani
Observatory in Alola.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: I’m also Soffy’s cousin. Nice to meet you.
story_26_02000/2401_0301_1100_10: Nice to meet you, too, sir!
story_26_02000/2401_0401_1200_10:
How polite! It seems the rumors about you being
a promising young Trainer were true.
story_26_02000/2401_0402_1400_10:
Yeah, he’s a lot older than I am, but Big Mo and I
are cousins—and best friends, too!
story_26_02000/2401_1001_1500_10:
These three have recently become interested in
sync stones and kindly agreed to assist me with
my research.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I’ve made significant strides since they came
aboard. Arigato, you all!
story_26_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
It’s great because we get to learn a lot of new
things, too.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Thanks to us researching together every day,
I even made friends with Clemont despite
my shyness.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I’m glad we became friends, Sophocles. It really is
fun to talk about science with you.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_2000_10: Wow. Looks like you two really hit it off, eh?
story_26_02000/2401_1001_2100_10:
A budding friendship between two young
inventors! How fantastic!
story_26_02000/2401_1001_2300_10:
I get super nervous if someone makes a big deal
out of taking my picture. So nervous that I might
pass out...
story_26_02000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Hahaha! I guess we still have some work to do
fixing that shyness of yours, Soffy.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Anyway, we heard about your predicament from
Professor Bellis.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_2600_10:
So you want to battle a lot of strong sync pairs to
prepare for your battle with Cynthia, huh?
story_26_02000/2401_1001_2700_10: Yeah! We want to power up big-time!
story_26_02000/2401_1001_2800_10: In that case, we may have just the thing...
story_26_02000/2401_1001_3000_10: You got it! It’s all ready to go!
story_26_02000/2401_1001_3100_10: The future is now, thanks to science!
story_26_02000/2401_1001_3400_10:
Don’t worry. That’s just the sound of our machine
powering on outside.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_3500_10:
We call it the Sync Pair Pinger! It’s a new
invention that we came up with.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_3600_10:
When activated, the machine’s antennae scan the
area for sync stones and ping the locations of
strong sync pairs.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_3700_10:
It then releases a special odor in the direction of
those locations—one that is particularly appealing
to strong Pokémon.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_3800_10:
Those strong Pokémon will then be lured to
the machine...
story_26_02000/2401_1001_3900_10:
...With their Trainers in hot pursuit until they both
wind up here!
story_26_02000/2401_1001_4000_10:
Ah, sorry. I guess we’re a little too excited about
our new invention. We could go on about it
for days!
story_26_02000/2401_1001_4100_10:
I know just what you mean! I can’t help myself
when I complete a new invention. I have to tell
everyone all about it!
story_26_02000/2401_1001_4200_10:
You were actually able to make a machine that
does all that?! You both are amazing!
story_26_02000/2401_1001_4300_10:
Doesn’t it feel great to have invented something
that will help a lot of people?
story_26_02000/2401_1001_4400_10:
My good friend Kukui said he comes around here
pretty often. Maybe you’ll be able to have a
battle with him.
story_26_02000/2401_1001_4600_10: Ah! The Sync Pair Pinger has a reading!
story_26_02000/2401_1001_4700_10: Come on, everyone! Let’s go take a look outside!
